Package com.samsung.samm.common

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SAMMFileInfo
    Provides SAMM file information.
    SAMMFileInfoFilter
    Information filter for extracting SAMMFileInfo.
    SAMMLibConstants
    The constant definition class used in the SAMM(Samsung Animated Multimedia Messaging) Library.
    SDataAttachFile
    The class for attaching file data.
    SDataAudio Deprecated
    SDataPageMemo
    The class for exchanging page memo data.
    SObject
    An abstract SAMM object class for exchanging data.
    SObjectFilling
    Class for color-filling object data.
    SObjectGroup
    Class for exchanging group object data.
    SObjectImage
    Class for exchanging image object data.
    SObjectStroke
    Class for exchanging stroke object data.
    SObjectText
    Class for exchanging text object data.
    SObjectVideo
    Class for exchanging video object data.
    SOptionPlay
    The background audio option in an animated SAMM file.
    SOptionSAMM
    Used to save/load SAMM files.
    SOptionSCanvas
    The S-Canvas options.
